name: part_020
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_020.mov

scenes.description: Opening talk segment after performance, including a crowd wave.
Matsuri talks about her experience practicing the dance.
Nene talks about the 'pressure' of being in the center position.
The group discusses being chosen as the 'good dancers' and comforts Nene.
Closing the YouTube preview segment and transitioning to the next part of the live.

subtitles.original: ペンライト振ってくれよな、みんな振ってー！
subtitles.english: Wave your penlights, everyone wave them!

subtitles.original: みんな！振ってー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Wave them!

subtitles.original: さすがだ、みんな根っこ！
subtitles.english: As expected, everyone's a Nekko!

subtitles.original: 泣いてた？
subtitles.english: Were you crying?

subtitles.original: それでは最後は全体で振りましょう。いくよ！
subtitles.english: Now, let's all wave together for the last time. Here we go!

subtitles.original: せーの！うわああああ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Uwaaaaa!

subtitles.original: すげー！これやってみたかったんだよ、スバルー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Amazing! I've always wanted to do this, Subaru!

subtitles.original: 本当すげー！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Really amazing! Thank you!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ちょっと真ん中戻りますか。
subtitles.english: Now, shall we head back to the center?

subtitles.original: 戻りましょう、戻りましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's go back, let's go back.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、『Candy-Go-Round』披露させていただいたんですけど、
subtitles.english: So, we just performed 'Candy-Go-Round',

subtitles.original: どうでしたちょっと踊ってみて、まつり先輩？
subtitles.english: but how was it for you to dance it, Matsuri-senpai?

subtitles.original: いやね、めちゃめちゃ楽しかったね。あのね、最初は...
subtitles.english: Well, it was super fun. You know, at first...

subtitles.original: 最初レッスンの時ね、もう、ここから入ったんですけど...
subtitles.english: during the first lesson, I started from right here...

subtitles.original: これな！マジで！
subtitles.english: That's right! For real!

subtitles.original: おっとおっとおっとって思ったんだけど、
subtitles.english: I was like 'whoa, whoa, whoa',

subtitles.original: まあ、意外にやってみると、まあ、できちゃうかな。
subtitles.english: but well, once I actually tried it, I guess I could do it.

subtitles.original: 俺、上手だったよ、まつり先輩！
subtitles.english: You were great, Matsuri-senpai!

subtitles.original: すげー！上手だった！
subtitles.english: Amazing! You were great!

subtitles.original: ありがとう... 嬉しいな。ガチで照れてる。
subtitles.english: Thank you... I'm happy. I'm actually blushing.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあ続いてねねち、どうでした踊ってみて？
subtitles.english: Alright, next up, Nenechi, how was it for you to dance it?

subtitles.original: いや、ねねはね、あのね、途中で真ん中に行くじゃんか。はいはい。
subtitles.english: Well, as for Nene, you know, I go to the center in the middle. Right, right.

subtitles.original: あの時のね、あの両端からのプレッシャー？ あれ、本当半端ない！
subtitles.english: The pressure from both sides at that time? That was seriously intense!

subtitles.original: やっときました！やっときました！
subtitles.english: We gave it to her! We gave it to her!

subtitles.original: やってみようよ！
subtitles.english: Let's try it!

subtitles.original: もういいよ！
subtitles.english: That's enough already!

subtitles.original: わ、すげー圧！ 先輩に挟まれし... こうしてね、みんなで... こうして...
subtitles.english: Whoa, so much pressure! Being sandwiched by seniors... like this, everyone...

subtitles.original: ぶつからないか心配でした。真ん中やっぱ目立っちゃうから。
subtitles.english: I was worried we'd bump into each other. Since the center stands out, after all.

subtitles.original: 確かにな！ ミスできないプレッシャー。
subtitles.english: True! The pressure of not being able to make a mistake.

subtitles.original: でも、すごく良かったと思うよ！
subtitles.english: But I think you were great!

subtitles.original: そうなの、ごまかした、ごまかした。
subtitles.english: That's right, I faked it, I faked it.

subtitles.original: ごまかしたとか言うなお前！
subtitles.english: Don't say you faked it!

subtitles.original: そうだよ、ごまかしたんじゃないよ。根っこにも聞いてみな！
subtitles.english: Exactly, you didn't fake it. Ask the Nekko too!

subtitles.original: ねねちゃんは生きてるだけで凄いんだよ！
subtitles.english: Nene-chan is amazing just for being alive!

subtitles.original: そっち来ない！ 会場に聞けや！
subtitles.english: Don't go that way! Ask the audience!

subtitles.original: え、みんなどうだった？
subtitles.english: Eh, how was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: 本当にね、やっぱダンス上手な三人って言って運営さんにね、集められたからね。
subtitles.english: Yes, really, we were gathered by the management as the three good dancers, after all.

subtitles.original: ねねち、そりゃ完璧だよね。
subtitles.english: So Nenechi, of course you were perfect.

subtitles.original: うん、そうよ！
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right!

subtitles.original: あんまり、あの、いびらないで頂いて。
subtitles.english: Please don't, uh, act so bossy.

subtitles.original: 泣かないで！ できてたよ！ すごく上手だった！
subtitles.english: Don't cry! You did it! You were very good!

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ可愛かった！ いいよ！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: You were super cute! It's okay! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、スバルたちの前にもね、かなたさんと、あとポルカちゃんと、
subtitles.english: And so, before us, Kanata-san, Polka-chan,

subtitles.original: あとね、クロヱがそれぞれね、個性的な世界観で... もうめっちゃみんなキャラ濃かったから。
subtitles.english: and Chloe also showed their unique worlds... everyone's characters were so strong.

subtitles.original: までもね、ここからはスバルたちも頑張っていきましょうと。
subtitles.english: Well, but from here on, let's also do our best.

subtitles.original: 負けてられませんよ！
subtitles.english: We can't let them beat us!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、なんとですね、YouTubeのチラ見せがここまでなんですよ！
subtitles.english: And so, believe it or not, the YouTube preview ends here!

subtitles.original: あーよ、あーよ！ やっほやっほ！
subtitles.english: A-yo, a-yo! Yahho yahho!

subtitles.original: やっほやっほじゃない！ 今？
subtitles.english: It's not 'Yahho yahho'! Now?

subtitles.original: あともこれからも見たいよね？ むしろね、見たい気持ちが高まってると思うのよ、皆さん！
subtitles.english: I'm sure you want to keep watching, right? I think everyone's desire to watch has only increased!

subtitles.original: はい！ そんな人はね、概要欄をチェックして！
subtitles.english: Yes! For those people, check the description box!

subtitles.original: チェックら！ チェケラ！ ここからチケット買ってください！ お願いします！
subtitles.english: Check it out! Please buy tickets from there! Please!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、そろそろ時間なのでまつり先輩締めて頂いていいですか？
subtitles.english: Alright, it's about time, so Matsuri-senpai, could you wrap things up?

subtitles.original: 時間が来ちゃったということで、次の曲に行きましょうか！
subtitles.english: Since time is up, shall we move on to the next song!

subtitles.original: それでは行きますよ！ せーの！ つながるホロライブー！
subtitles.english: Here we go! One, two! Connecting hololive!
